Text: Very nice ;) Keep up the good work
This is WSOP main event part 4 not players championship.
I never understood why they keep the poker commercials in these rips, wut up with dat?
I guess they figure people watching would actually be interested in those commercials.

Thanks for the heads up on not being Player's Championship.  Already downloaded Main Event 3 & 4 a week ago from TPB.

The poker commercials are actually inserted by the capper so far as I can tell; those aren't commercials from the original broadcast.

Thanks for the uploads; looking forward to Day 4.
